The programming of Mega consists mainly of Greek programmes such as comedies, dramas, news and entertainment shows.
The programming of Ant1 consists mainly of Greek programmes such as comedies, dramas, news, reality and entertainment shows.
Star features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on foreign movies and shows.
Alpha features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on entertainment programs.
Skai features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on news, current affairs and documentaries.
E TV features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on news and entertainment programs.
Macedonia TV features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on entertainment programs.
NET is mainly a news and information channel that broadcasts daily newscasts, documentaries, talkshows and sporting events.
The programming of ET3 consists of news and includes sports, movies, documentaries, tv shows, music and children's shows.
NERIT is mainly a news and information channel that broadcasts daily newscasts, documentaries, talkshows and sporting events.
NERIT is mainly a news and information channel that broadcasts daily newscasts, documentaries, talkshows and sporting events.
Vouli Television is the television network of the Greek Parliament. The program broadcasts all the inner workings of Parliament and includes various cultural programs, news, documentaries and opera.
Euronews is the leading international news channel covering world news from a European perspective. The channel broadcasts in Greek.

The programming of Mega Cyprus consists mainly of Greek programmes such as comedies, dramas, news and entertainment shows. Broadcasts many of the programmes of Mega Greece and several Cypriot programmes.

The programming of Ant1 Cyprus consists mainly of Greek programmes such as comedies, dramas, news, reality and entertainment shows. Broadcasts many of the programmes of Ant1 Greece and several Cypriot programmes.
Sigma features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on sports, news, movies, series and telenovelas. It also has an affiliation agreement with Alpha from Greece.
Capital TV features a mix of Greek and foreign shows with an emphasis on sports, news, movies, series and telenovelas.
The international network of CyBC! A 24-hour programme of entertainment shows, cartoons, tv shows, weekly news reports, news and sports. The channel broadcasts in Greek and English.
Nickelodeon is the ultimate fun destination for children and the most popular cartoon and teen series channel in the world.
Nickelodeon+ is the ultimate fun destination for children and the most popular cartoon and teen series channel in the world.
MTV is the largest music, entertainment and lifestyle channel in the world and it is a solid choice for young people.
MAD TV is the first music station in Greece and it broadcasts music related programming including video clips, music news and interviews as well as concert footage.
MAD TV CYPRUS is a music station in Cyprus and it broadcasts music related programming including video clips, music news and interviews as well as concert footage.
MUSIC TV is a youthful and entertainment channel in Cyprus and it broadcasts music related programming including video clips, music news and interviews.
Greek Cinema is a channel filled with the biggest stars and memorable films of Greek cinema. Greek movies, classic and modern.
Lampsi TV is a web channel that broadcasts diverse entertainment programming including movies.
Alpha GATV is a web channel that broadcasts diverse entertainment programming including movies.
CySports is a 24-hour sports channel broadcasting racing events and activities from the 64 Cypriot Athletic Federations and aims to achieve the promotion of Cypriot talent in all sporting areas.
ODIE TV is a television network dedicated to covering live horseracing from all racecourses in Greece. The channel is owned by ODIE.
Kontra Channel is mainly an alternative news and information channel and its programming is enhanced with two ecological zones of programmes, but also with many other programmes.
Extra 3 is an alternative news and information channel with telemarketing, news, current affairs and entertainment shows. In addition, the ratings of evening news zone are very high.
Action 24 is an alternative news and sports channel that exclusively broadcasts the championships of Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Denmark, Ukraine and Russia.
The programming of ART consists current affairs programmes, programmes around the party that is supported by the network and music programmes.
ZOOM is an news and information channel with telemarketing, news, current affairs and entertainment shows. The channel also broadcasts ZOUGLA TV programmes in Athens.
ZOUGLA TV is an news and information channel with telemarketing, news, current affairs and entertainment shows. The channel is owned by zougla.gr news portal.
ATTICA TV is a television network owned by the municipality of Aspropyrgos. The programming consists mainly of Greek programmes such as entertainment shows.
High TV is a television network broadcasting from Athens. The programming consists mainly of Greek programmes such as news and entertainment shows.
Blue Sky is a television network that broadcasts current affairs and educational programmes, foreign tv shows and entertainment programmes.
The programming of Channel 9 consists news, current affairs and business programmes, foreign movies and cartoons. It also includes news of Al Jazeera International in Greek language.
SBC TV is the first television network in Greece that informs and presents news and developments from the field of economy and business.
Smile TV is a children's channel. The program consists of family-friendly and children's programmes.
TV 100 is a television network owned by the municipality of Salonica. The programming consists mainly of Greek programmes such as news and entertainment shows.
4E TV is a religious television network owned by the Orthodox Church of Greece and is the first television channel in the world dedicated to the Greek Orthodox faith.
